headline: Compared to Estimates, Con Ed (ED) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Con Ed (ED) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

raw.headline: Compared to Estimates, Con Ed (ED) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
raw.summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Con Ed (ED) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Consolidated Edison (ED) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Con Ed (ED) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.52% and +6.17%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Consolidated Edison (ED) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
raw.summary: Con Ed (ED) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.52% and +6.17%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Con Ed: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The New York-based company said it had profit of 68 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were 67 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Con Ed: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The New York-based company said it had profit of 68 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were 67 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: CON EDISON REPORTS 2025 SECOND QUARTER EARNINGS
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) today reported 2025 second quarter net income for common stock of $246 million or $0.68 a share compared with $202 million or $0.58 a share in the 2024 second quarter. Adjusted earnings (non-GAAP) were $240 million or $0.67 a share in the 2025 period compared with $203 million or $0.59 a share in the 2024 period. Adjusted earnings and adjusted earnings per share in the 2025 period exclude accretion of the basis difference of Con Edison's equity i
